    (Conference Paper) Mulkar-Mehta, R., Hobbs, J. R., & Hovy, E. (2011). Granularity in natural language discourse. In Proceedings of the Ninth International Conference on Computational Semantics (IWCS 2011).

    (Conference Paper) Mulkar-Mehta, R., Hobbs, J. R., & Hovy, E. H. (2011, March). Applications of Discovery of Granularity Structures in Natural Language Discourse. In AAAI Spring Symposium: logical formalizations of commonsense reasoning.

In Proceedings of the 21st International Conference on Computational Linguistics and 44th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (pp. 393-400). (Acceptance rate: 23%)
